MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 1:51pm in the LL23 postcode area of Bala following reports of a grounded overhead line. This may affect the supply to your property. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have confrimed there is a grounded overhead line affecting the remaining customers. We will work to restore power to all remaining customers as quickly and as safely as possible and we now expect the power to be on by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4PM on March 11, 2021.
